N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.27 - Parking, standing or stopping

State Regulations
(a) Parking, standing or stopping is prohibited within the parkway system, except
in areas designated by the authority or except in cases of emergency. In cases
of emergency, vehicles may be parked, stopped or standing on the shoulders or
on the grass area to the right of the laned roadways facing the direction of
travel, with all wheels and any projecting part of such vehicle, including the
load thereon, completely clear of the laned roadway. (b) Vehicles illegally parked, disabled or
abandoned within the parkway system may be towed off the parkway system and
impounded. Such vehicles may not be removed from the designated storage area
until after the payment of towing, storage and other authorized
charges. Notes
